mean_en: a game for two people played on a board marked with black and white squares on which each playing piece (representing a king, queen, castle, etc.) is moved according to special rules. The aim is to put the other player’s king in a position from which it cannot escape (= to checkmate it).
sentence: He and his friend were playing chess together.
sentence_trans: 他和他的朋友在一起下棋。
